projectGridLines.title: Product Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Product Intern

Goodera is looking for a product management intern to help us maintain and improve

our volunteering product. You'll be closely working with engineering, design and

marketing teams to drive the product adoption and improve product experience for

users by owning certain pieces of the product completely.

What do you need to have?

? Willingness to learn.

? Excellent writing skills to communicate the asks clearly-

? Excellent oral presentation skills in case you need to communicate requirements in person or

over the phone

? You should read a lot.

? Sharp eye for detail, empathy and passion for tech.

? Fluency in SQL and MS excel, and an analytical mind to identify patterns and make data informed

decisions

? Has high levels of diligence/ownership: you will be making key decisions for the product.

What will you do?

? Crafting simple and dependable data pipelines and enabling reporting of key success metrics.

? Bring context into the product, identify experience gaps and fix them.

? Curate product awareness & adoption strategy catering to end users, internal and external

stakeholders and execute on the same.

? You will be owning a part of the product in rolling out new features.
